>
>
> Has anyone here had any experience crawling lotus notes sites? and
> could provide general crawling recommendations. I can get more
> specific about the issues after I run some more crawls, but thought
> someone might pass on some experience and potential tips.
>







I've crawled several sites that use a Notes/Domino CMS. No problems or 
special Heritrix settings necessary so far.
It might depend on how the particular CMS composes the public URLs for 
the Notes documents (these will in most cases not just be the "generic" 
URL with the docID), but generally I don't see a problem here.

Max
